Rulings.Edison: ●You must have at least 1 Plant-Type monster in your GY in order to activate this card. The ATK increase is locked-in when this card resolves. The ATK increase won't change if the number of Plant-Type monsters in your GY changes after this card resolves. The ATK increase won't apply to Plant-Type monsters Summoned after this card resolves. The effect to destroy all face-up Plant-Type monsters you control will apply to monsters Summoned after this card resolves. You can activate “Raging Mad Plants” during the Damage Step. The effect to destroy all face-up Plant-Type monsters you control does not start a Chain.

The ATK increase will not change if the number of Plant-Type monsters in your GY changes after this card resolves. The ATK increase will not apply to Plant-Type monsters Summoned after this card resolves. The effect to destroy all face-up Plant-Type monsters you control will apply to monsters Summoned after this card resolves. You can activate “Raging Mad Plants” during the Damage Step. The effect to destroy all face-up Plant-Type monsters you control does not start a Chain.

Rulings.Base:
1. You must have at least 1 Plant-Type monster in your GY in order to activate this card.
2. The ATK increase is locked-in when this card resolves. The ATK increase will not change if the number of Plant-Type monsters in your GY changes after this card resolves.
3. The ATK increase will not apply to Plant-Type monsters Summoned after this card resolves. The effect to destroy all face-up Plant-Type monsters you control will apply to monsters Summoned after this card resolves.
4. You can activate "Raging Mad Plants" during the Damage Step.
5. The effect to destroy all face-up Plant-Type monsters you control does not start a Chain.

PSCT.Base: All Plant-Type monsters you currently control gain 300 ATK for each Plant-Type monster currently in your Graveyard, until the end of this turn. During the End Phase, destroy all Plant-Type monsters you control.
